targets.rawSql:
SELECT date, type_source, initialization
FROM (
    SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY type_source ORDER BY date DESC) AS row_num
    FROM app_system.tasks
    WHERE type_source LIKE '%daily_task%'
) AS ranked_tasks
WHERE row_num = 1;

SELECT date, type_source, initialization
FROM (
    SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY type_source ORDER BY date DESC) AS row_num
    FROM app_system.tasks
    WHERE type_source LIKE 'daily%'
) AS ranked_tasks
WHERE row_num = 1;

panels.title: Last start daily task for source

targets.rawSql: SELECT date_, count_ AS mdb_count FROM reports.mdb_account_creationdate;
SELECT date_, count_ AS gp_count FROM reports.gp_lysloyalty_ods_v_account_creationdate;
SELECT sum(count_) AS mdb FROM reports.mdb_account_creationdate;
SELECT sum(count_) AS gp FROM reports.gp_lysloyalty_ods_v_account_creationdate;

panels.title: Account.account -> lysloyalty_ods.account (creationdate) - Count rows in sources

targets.rawSql:
SELECT mdb.date_, gp.count_ - mdb.count_ AS delta_creationdate
FROM reports.mdb_account_creationdate AS mdb
JOIN reports.gp_lysloyalty_ods_v_account_creationdate AS gp
  ON mdb.date_ = gp.date_

SELECT mdb.date_, gp.count_ - mdb.count_ AS delta_updatedate
FROM reports.mdb_account_updatedate AS mdb
JOIN reports.gp_lysloyalty_ods_v_account_updatedate AS gp
  ON mdb.date_ = gp.date_

SELECT mdb.date_, 0 AS baseline
FROM reports.mdb_account_creationdate AS mdb
SELECT date_, count_ AS mdb_count FROM reports.mdb_clearedsupport_updatedate;
SELECT date_, count_ AS gp_count FROM reports.gp_lysloyalty_ods_v_cleared_support_validityenddate;
SELECT date_, count_ AS mdb_count FROM reports.mdb_eventhistory_eventdate;
SELECT date_, count_ AS gp_count FROM reports.gp_lysloyalty_ods_v_event_eventdate;
SELECT sum(count_) AS mdb FROM reports.mdb_eventhistory_eventdate;
SELECT sum(count_) AS gp FROM reports.gp_lysloyalty_ods_v_event_eventdate;

SELECT mdb.date_, gp.count_ - mdb.count_ AS delta
FROM reports.mdb_eventhistory_eventdate AS mdb
JOIN reports.gp_lysloyalty_ods_v_event_eventdate AS gp
  ON mdb.date_ = gp.date_

SELECT mdb.date_, 0 AS baseline
FROM reports.mdb_eventhistory_eventdate AS mdb

SELECT SUM(gp.count_ - mdb.count_) AS total_negative_delta
FROM reports.mdb_eventhistory_eventdate AS mdb
JOIN reports.gp_lysloyalty_ods_v_event_eventdate AS gp
  ON mdb.date_ = gp.date_
WHERE gp.count_ - mdb.count_ < 0;
SELECT date_, count_ AS mdb_count FROM reports.mdb_transactions_creationdate;
SELECT date_, count_ AS gp_count_receipt_header FROM reports.gp_lysloyalty_rewards_ods_v_receipt_lys_header_creationdate;
SELECT date_, count_ AS gp_count_receipt_lines FROM reports.gp_lysloyalty_rewards_ods_v_receipt_lys_lines_creationdate;
SELECT sum(count_) AS mdb_transactions FROM reports.mdb_transactions_creationdate;
SELECT sum(count_) AS gp_receipt_header FROM reports.gp_lysloyalty_rewards_ods_v_receipt_lys_header_creationdate;
SELECT sum(count_) AS gp_rewards_lines FROM reports.gp_lysloyalty_rewards_ods_v_receipt_lys_lines_creationdate;

panels.title: Discount-history.transactions  -> lysloyalty_rewards_ods - Count rows in sources

targets.rawSql:
SELECT mdb.date_, gp.count_ - mdb.count_ AS delta_receipt_header
FROM reports.mdb_transactions_creationdate AS mdb
JOIN reports.gp_lysloyalty_rewards_ods_v_receipt_lys_header_creationdate AS gp
  ON mdb.date_ = gp.date_

SELECT mdb.date_, gp.count_ - mdb.count_ AS delta_receipt_lines
FROM reports.mdb_transactions_creationdate AS mdb
JOIN reports.gp_lysloyalty_rewards_ods_v_receipt_lys_lines_creationdate AS gp
  ON mdb.date_ = gp.date_

SELECT mdb.date_, 0 AS baseline
FROM reports.mdb_transactions_creationdate AS mdb

panels.title: Discount-history.transactions  -> lysloyalty_rewards_ods - Count rows in sources

targets.rawSql:
SELECT mdb.date_, gp.count_ - mdb.count_ AS delta
FROM reports.mdb_aggregatedcounter_updatedate AS mdb
JOIN reports.gp_lysloyalty_ods_v_aggregated_counter_updatedate AS gp
  ON mdb.date_ = gp.date_

SELECT mdb.date_, gp.count_ - mdb.count_ AS delta
FROM reports.mdb_rank_updatedate AS mdb
JOIN reports.gp_lysloyalty_ods_v_rank_updatedate AS gp
  ON mdb.date_ = gp.date_
